Package game.managers

Class ConsumedItemManager

java.lang.Object
game.managers.ConsumedItemManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resettable
public class ConsumedItemManager extends Object implements Resettable

Consumed Item Manager

Stores item that has been consumed by the actor. It manages and checks if the item buff should be removed from the actor every turn.

    • consumedItemTicker

      public void consumedItemTicker()
      It can be called every turn to check if consumed item buffs should be removed. If yes, it removes that item from consumed item list and remove buffs from the actor.
